OFF_THREAD.TITLE: OFF DAY THREAD: {date:%A, %B %d}
OFF_THREAD.FOOTER: No game today. Feel free to discuss whatever you want in this thread.

TWITTER.TEXT: The {myTeam:name} are off today. Come pass the time in our off day thread: {link} #{myTeam:name}

Game day!{series: %D Game %N -} {awayTeam:name} ({awayTeam:wins}-{awayTeam:losses}) @ {homeTeam:name} ({homeTeam:wins}-{homeTeam:losses}) - {date:%I:%M%p %Z}. Join the discussion in our pregame thread: {link} #{myTeam:name}{dh: #doubleheader game %N}
TWITTER.CONSOLIDATED_DH_TEXT: Doubleheader day!{series: %D -} {awayTeam:name} ({awayTeam:wins}-{awayTeam:losses}) @ {homeTeam:name} ({homeTeam:wins}-{homeTeam:losses}). Join the discussion in our pregame thread: {link} #{myTeam:name}{dh: #doubleheader}

CONTENT.FOOTER: Remember to **sort by new** to keep up!

TWITTER.TEXT: {series:%D Game %N - }{dh:DH Game %N - }{awayTeam:name} ({awayTeam:wins}-{awayTeam:losses}) @ {homeTeam:name} ({homeTeam:wins}-{homeTeam:losses}) - {date:%I:%M%p %Z}. Join the discussion in our game thread: {link} #{myTeam:name}{dh: #doubleheader}

POST_THREAD.OTHER_TITLE: POST GAME THREAD:{series: %D Game %N -} {awayTeam:name} ({awayTeam:wins}-{awayTeam:losses}) @ {homeTeam:name} ({homeTeam:wins}-{homeTeam:losses}) - {date:%a %b %d @ %I:%M%p %Z}{dh: - DH Game %N}

TWITTER.WIN_TEXT: {series:%D Game %N - }{dh:DH Game %N - }{myTeam:name} win! Join the discussion in our postgame thread: {link} #{myTeam:name}{dh: #doubleheader}
TWITTER.LOSS_TEXT: {series:%D Game %N - }{dh:DH Game %N - }Game over! Join the discussion in our postgame thread: {link} #{myTeam:name}{dh: #doubleheader}
TWITTER.OTHER_TEXT: {series:%D Game %N - }{dh:DH Game %N - }Game over! Join the discussion in our postgame thread: {link} #{myTeam:name}{dh: #doubleheader}
